4.1: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 1, Chelsea 0. Joe Willock (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Miguel Almirón.

6.1: Goal!  Newcastle United 1, Aston Villa 0. Callum Wilson (Newcastle United) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
6.2: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 2, Aston Villa 0. Callum Wilson (Newcastle United) header from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kieran Trippier   following a corner.
6.3: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 3, Aston Villa 0. Joelinton (Newcastle United) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal    following a fast break.
6.4: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 4, Aston Villa 0. Miguel Almirón (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Callum Wilson.

8.1: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 1, Everton 0. Miguel Almirón (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Bruno Guimarães.

10.1: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 1, Brentford 0. Bruno Guimarães (Newcastle United) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Kieran Trippier with a cross   following a corner.
10.2: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 2, Brentford 0. Jacob Murphy (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Callum Wilson.
10.3: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 3, Brentford 1. Bruno Guimarães (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner.
10.4: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 4, Brentford 1. Miguel Almirón (Newcastle United) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner.

16.1: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 1, Manchester City 1. Miguel Almirón (Newcastle United) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Allan Saint-Maximin with a cross.Goal awarded following VAR Review.
16.2: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 2, Manchester City 1. Callum Wilson (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Allan Saint-Maximin.
16.3: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 3, Manchester City 1. Kieran Trippier (Newcastle United) from a free kick with a right footed shot to the top left corner.

18.1: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 1, Nottingham Forest 0. Fabian Schär (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner    following a corner.
18.2: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 2, Nottingham Forest 0. Callum Wilson (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Joelinton.

19.1: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 1, Fulham 0. Alexander Isak (Newcastle United) header from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Callum Wilson.

21.1: Goal! Goal!  Newcastle United 1, West Ham United 0. Callum Wilson (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Sean Longstaff with a through ball.
